topic.title: Human Clinical Laboratory Test Result - conformance rules

section.p: Information on laboratory data collected on a reporting form or received from a central provider or vendor.

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code
A coded value that identifies the laboratory test result. The verbatim text is placed within the original text property of the CD data type. [SDTM: LBTESTCD, LBTEST. LBLOINC] If the LOINC code is available it should be used as the base code within the CD type.

SHALL contain [1..2] id
A value that is provided to ensure the uniqueness of the laboratory result. [SDTM: LBSEQ, LBSPID] A single identifier, the sequence number, is required.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] statusCode
Used to indicate whether or not an exam has been performed. [SDTM: LBSTAT]

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] value with data type CD
The laboratory result, using both original units and a standard format or set of units. [SDTM: LBORRES, LBORRESU, LBSTRESC, LBSTRESN, LBSTRESU]
Contains zero or one [0..1] group Identifier with data type Group Identifier

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] methodCode
Indicates the method of the test or examination. [SDTM: LBMETHOD]
Contains zero or one [0..1] specimen Information with data type Specimen Information
Contains zero or one [0..1] laboratoryTestResultCategoryAssociation with data type laboratory Test Result Category Association
Contains zero or one [0..1] laboratoryTestResultSubCategoryAssociation with data type laboratory Test Result Sub Category Association
Contains zero or one [0..1] referenceRangeAssociation with data type reference Range Association
Contains zero or one [0..1] nonPerformanceReason with data type Non Performance Reason
Contains zero or one [0..1] study Test Performer with data type Study Test Performer
Contains zero or one [0..1] baseline Indicator with data type Baseline Indicator
Contains zero or one [0..1] derived Data Indicator with data type Derived Data Indicator
Contains zero or one [0..1] fastingAssociation with data type fasting Association
Contains zero or one [0..1] labToxicityAssociation with data type lab Toxicity Association
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)

SHALL contain [1..2] id
A value that is provided to ensure the uniqueness of the laboratory result. [SDTM: LBSEQ, LBSPID] A single identifier, the sequence number, is required.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code
A coded value that identifies the laboratory test result. The verbatim text is placed within the original text property of the CD data type. [SDTM: LBTESTCD, LBTEST. LBLOINC] If the LOINC code is available it should be used as the base code within the CD type.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] statusCode
Used to indicate whether or not an exam has been performed. [SDTM: LBSTAT]

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] value with data type CD
The laboratory result, using both original units and a standard format or set of units. [SDTM: LBORRES, LBORRESU, LBSTRESC, LBSTRESN, LBSTRESU]

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] methodCode
Indicates the method of the test or examination. [SDTM: LBMETHOD]
Contains zero or one [0..1] group Identifier with data type Group Identifier
Contains zero or one [0..1] specimen Information with data type Specimen Information
Contains zero or one [0..1] laboratoryTestResultCategoryAssociation with data type laboratory Test Result Category Association
Contains zero or one [0..1] laboratoryTestResultSubCategoryAssociation with data type laboratory Test Result Sub Category Association
Contains zero or one [0..1] referenceRangeAssociation with data type reference Range Association
Contains zero or one [0..1] nonPerformanceReason with data type Non Performance Reason
Contains zero or one [0..1] study Test Performer with data type Study Test Performer
Contains zero or one [0..1] baseline Indicator with data type Baseline Indicator
Contains zero or one [0..1] derived Data Indicator with data type Derived Data Indicator
Contains zero or one [0..1] fastingAssociation with data type fasting Association
Contains zero or one [0..1] labToxicityAssociation with data type lab Toxicity Association
